name: Being Rabbit
description: Home means be in search of to us. So in this game we are searching for our home. While searching we are encounter with the items that are meaningful and harmful to us. Main character is a rabbit toy who wishes to find his home. Rabbit is also struggles with anxiety, the road is full of items that are benefit and harmful to our heart. Home is things that make us feel tranquility such as person who we love, toys from childhood or just food... GGJ Istanbul @ Bilgi Game 2019
